pages.text: If $(l:signs_abilities/selection_wheel)selected$(), the Witcher can press $(6)$(l)[$(k:origins.ternary_active)]$() $(l)(Origins: Ternary Active)$() to cast Yrden - a ring of warding runes inscribed onto a surface that slows foes passing through it. Witchers are immune to the effects of Yrden. Yrden has a cooldown of 14s after casting.

pages.title: Cooldown Bar
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Yrden can be used to slow enemies who are chasing you!
